mapper.select: SELECT STATE, count(*) AS CNT FROM APPLY WHERE cr_num IN ( SELECT cr_num FROM COMPANYRESUME WHERE M_NUM=#{m_num} ) GROUP BY STATE
SELECT b.cr_num, m.name, b.ob_type, b.disease, b.payment FROM APPLY a JOIN COMPANYRESUME b ON (a.cr_num = b.cr_num) LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON (m.m_num = b.m_num) WHERE a.j_num = #{a.j_num}
